summary: Bixente Lizarazu  is a former French football player.
full_text:
Bixente Lizarazu , initially registered as Vincent Lizarazu,  is a retired French footballer who played for Bordeaux and Bayern Munich, among other teams, as a left-back. He also had 97 caps for the French national team.
In a twelve-year international career from 1992 to 2004, Lizarazu played in three European championships and two World Cups for France, winning the 1998 World Cup and Euro 2000.
title: Bixente Lizarazu
